thread.section_title: Le Relais Madeleine - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful price/location ratio
thread.title_full: Wonderful price/location ratio - Review of Le Relais Madeleine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Seza E
title: Wonderful price/location ratio
text: Very cute homey "relais". Small rooms (as always in Paris) but well-kept and clean. Not noisy as it tends to happen in Paris. Location is optimal as it is close both to the business and tourist districts. The Staff was exceptional; the gentleman at the reception looked for a breakfast venue where they had gluten free even though I didn't ask any help. Price is super reasonable for the area. I did not have breakfast so I can't relate on that.
